name: MIS Report New Purchase Order
query:
SELECT 
    `tabPurchase Order`.supplier as "Entity:Link/Supplier:200",
    `tabPurchase Order`.name as "Purchase Order:Link/Purchase Order:200",
    `tabPurchase Order`.custom_purchase_receipt as "Purchase Receipt:Link/Purchase Receipt:200",
    `tabPurchase Order Item`.item_name as "Product Name:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Order`.custom_order_code as "Order Code:Data:120",
    `tabPurchase Order Item`.item_group as "Category:Link/Item Group:200",
    `tabPurchase Order Item`.gst_hsn_code as "HSN Code:Int:100",
    `tabPurchase Order`.transaction_date as "PO Date:Date:120",
    `tabPurchase Order`.schedule_date as "Required By:Date:120",
    `tabPurchase Order`.custom_branch as "Branch Name:Link/Branch:200",
    `tabPurchase Order`.custom_sub_branch as "Sub Branch:Link/Sub Branch:150",
    `tabPurchase Order`.custom_vendor as "Vendor:Link/Vendor:150",
    `tabPurchase Order Item`.amount as "Gross Amount:Currency:170",
    `tabPurchase Order Item`.cgst_amount as "CGST:Currency:170",
    `tabPurchase Order Item`.sgst_amount as "SGST:Currency:170",
    `tabPurchase Order Item`.igst_amount as "IGST:Currency:170",
    (`tabPurchase Order Item`.amount + `tabPurchase Order Item`.cgst_amount + `tabPurchase Order Item`.sgst_amount + `tabPurchase Order Item`.igst_amount) as "Total:Currency:170",
    `tabPurchase Order`.workflow_state as "Status:Data:120",
    `tabPurchase Order`.custom_awaiting_for as "Awaiting For:Link/User:150",
    `tabPurchase Order`.custom_created_by as "Created By:Data:200",
    `tabPurchase Order`.custom_created_at as "Created At:Datetime:150",
    `tabPurchase Order`.custom__approved_at as "Approved At:Datetime:150"
